name: Ze Ork In Da Lup
description:
The magician kidnapped the poor orc and put on him magic shackles, which were supposed to return him every 20 seconds back to his place in the cage. He wanted to mock and show his superiority over him. But the orc is not stupid!

He knows that the temporary noose of the shackles can be tied not only to the cage, but also to the magic doors.

Therefore, the main task of the orc is to find the Mage and talk to him face to face!
